00047 bool cClustering::initialise( const unsigned int size,  
00048                                                           cVector3int* ptBuffer )       
00049 {
00050         if( NULL == ptBuffer ||
00051                 0 == size                )
00052         {
00053                 return false;
00054         }
00055 
00056         m_size = size;
00057         m_buffer = ptBuffer;
00058 
00059         return true;
00060 }

00067 bool cClustering::createNormalisedVectors( const cMovement* movementArray,                      
00068                                                                                    const unsigned int nbMovement,                       
00069                                                                                    cMovement** ptNormalisedMovementArray,       
00070                                                                                    cMovement* ptAverageMovement,                        
00071                                                                                    cMovement* ptAllMovementsPoints,                     
00072                                                                                    unsigned int *ptMovementNormalisedSize)      
00074 {
00075         // Check inputs
00076         if( NULL == movementArray                               || 
00077                 0 == nbMovement                                         ||
00078                 NULL == ptNormalisedMovementArray       ||
00079                 NULL == ptAverageMovement                       ||
00080                 NULL == ptAllMovementsPoints    )
00081         {
00082                 return false;
00083         }
00084 
00085         // calculate average size, multiply by 2 for normalised size
00086         unsigned int nbPoints = 0;
00087         unsigned int normalisedMovementSize = 0;
00088         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00089         {
00090                 nbPoints += movementArray[i].getSize();
00091         }
00092         normalisedMovementSize = (int)(nbPoints*1.5f) ;
00093         normalisedMovementSize /= nbMovement;
00094         if( NULL != ptMovementNormalisedSize ){
00095                 *ptMovementNormalisedSize = normalisedMovementSize;
00096         }
00097 
00098         ptAllMovementsPoints->initialise( nbPoints + normalisedMovementSize*(nbMovement+1) );
00099         ptAverageMovement->initialise( normalisedMovementSize );
00100 
00101         // Normalise vectors
00102         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00103         {
00104                 cMovement::changeVectorSize( movementArray[i], normalisedMovementSize, &(*ptNormalisedMovementArray)[i] );
00105         }
00106 
00107         // Create average vector of normalised vectors
00108         for( unsigned int i=0; i<normalisedMovementSize; i++ )
00109         {
00110                 cVector3int* ptPoint = &( ptAverageMovement->modifyBuffer()[i] );
00111                 *ptPoint = cVector3int(0, 0, 0);
00112 
00113                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<nbMovement; j++ )
00114                 {
00115                         *ptPoint += (*ptNormalisedMovementArray)[j].getData( i );
00116                 }
00117                 *ptPoint /= nbMovement;
00118         }
00119 
00120         //----------------
00121         // fill the allObservations buffer
00122         cVector3int* bigBuffer = ptAllMovementsPoints->modifyBuffer();
00123 
00124         // the movements vectors points
00125         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00126         {
00127                 for( unsigned int j=0; j < movementArray[i].getSize() ; j++ )
00128                 {
00129                         *bigBuffer = movementArray[i].getData( j );
00130                         bigBuffer ++;
00131                 }
00132         }
00133         
00134         // the normalised vectors points
00135         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbMovement; i++ )
00136         {
00137                 for( unsigned int j=0; j<normalisedMovementSize; j++ )
00138                 {
00139                         *bigBuffer = (*ptNormalisedMovementArray)[i].getData( j );
00140                         bigBuffer ++;
00141                 }
00142         }
00143 
00144         // the average vector
00145         for( unsigned int j=0; j<normalisedMovementSize; j++ )
00146         {
00147                 *bigBuffer = ptAverageMovement->getData( j );
00148                 bigBuffer ++;
00149         }
00150 
00151         return true;
00152 }
